_header: Here lies Earl George the Briton
Subjects: Dunbar, George, earl of Dunbar; epitaphs
_description: Memorial verses for the tomb of the Earl of Dunbar, 1416 — 3 couplets

BLAdd37223.Transcription:
heir lyis Erle george þe brytanto þir iii kingis þat
                    bair þe crownewos of þair bluid & of þair kynnand
                    hes gouerment þis land win
BLAdd37223.Note: Written as prose. Four lines, abaa.
